reviewText: I hope all Canadians  know about Norman Bethune (a true humanitarian).  I recall seeing this story on Canadian TV many years ago.  Because I admire Donald Sutherland and his career, I decided I should re-acquaint myself with Dr. Bethune.
See review above. Politically this film is great. You get enough English to understand the move. If it were 100% English it would get 5 stars.
